summary: No automatic directory-changing behavior found in Neovim or WezTerm configuration. All directory changes are user-triggered. Further user observation needed to reproduce the exact scenario.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of Neovim and WezTerm configurations showing no automatic directory-changing behavior

next_steps: User should document exact reproduction steps - the behavior may be caused by: (1) opening a file with absolute path, (2) zoxide intelligent directory jumping, or (3) external shell aliases/scripts
